SEARCH

Class Loadout

java.lang.Object
Loadout
public class Loadout extends Object
A champion's loadout, which includes a tactic, a relic, and a pocketed gambit, and any temporary modifiers that are active. The loadout is used to manage the champion's current state in the game, including the active modifiers and the items that are currently equipped.

  • Constructor Details

    • Loadout

      public Loadout()
      Constructor for the Loadout class. Initializes the loadout with no tactic, relic, or pocketed gambit.

  • Method Details

    • getTactic

      public Tactic getTactic()
      Get the champion's current tactic.
      Returns:
      The current tactic, or null if none is equipped.

    • getRelic

      public Relic getRelic()
      Get the champion's current relic.
      Returns:
      The current relic, or null if none is equipped.

    • getPocketedGambit

      public Gambit getPocketedGambit()
      Get the champion's current pocketed gambit.
      Returns:
      The current pocketed gambit, or null if none is equipped.

    • getTacticName

      public String getTacticName()
      Get the name of the champion's current tactic.
      Returns:
      The name of the current tactic, or "None" if none is equipped.

    • getRelicName

      public String getRelicName()
      Get the name of the champion's current relic.
      Returns:
      The name of the current relic, or "None" if none is equipped.

    • getGambitName

      public String getGambitName()
      Get the name of the champion's current pocketed gambit.
      Returns:
      The name of the current pocketed gambit, or "None" if none is equipped.

    • swapTactic

      public Tactic swapTactic(Tactic newTactic)
      This method replaces the current tactic with the new tactic and returns the old tactic. If the new tactic is null, the current tactic is removed.
      Parameters:
      newTactic - The new tactic to replace the current tactic.
      Returns:
      The old tactic, or null if there was no tactic to replace.

    • swapRelic

      public Relic swapRelic(Relic newRelic)
      This method replaces the current relic with the new relic and returns the old relic. If the new relic is null, the current relic is removed.
      Parameters:
      newRelic - The new relic to replace the current relic.
      Returns:
      The old relic, or null if there was no relic to replace.

    • swapPocketedGambit

      public Gambit swapPocketedGambit(Gambit newGambit)
      This method replaces the current pocketed gambit with the new gambit and returns the old gambit. If the new gambit is null, the current gambit is removed.
      Parameters:
      newGambit - The new gambit to replace the current gambit.
      Returns:
      The old gambit, or null if there was no gambit to replace.

    • clearGambit

      public Gambit clearGambit()
      This method clears the current pocketed gambit and returns it. This is useful for removing the gambit from the loadout without replacing it with a new one.
      Returns:
      The old gambit, or null if there was no gambit to clear.

    • addTemporaryModifier

      public void addTemporaryModifier(BattleModifier mod)
      This method adds a temporary modifier to the loadout. Temporary modifiers such as status effects or buffs are added to the loadout and will be removed when they expire.
      Parameters:
      mod - The temporary modifier to add to the loadout.

    • getActiveModifiers

      public List<BattleModifier> getActiveModifiers()
      Get a list of all active modifiers in the loadout. This includes the current tactic, relic, and any temporary modifiers that are active. The pocketed gambit is only included if it is activated.
      Returns:
      A list of all active modifiers in the loadout.

    • endTurn

      public void endTurn(BattleContext context)
      End the turn by removing expired modifiers and clearing temporary modifiers. This method should be called at the end of each turn to ensure that the loadout is ready for the next turn.
      Parameters:
      context - The context of the battle, including the current round and the current champion.
